column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Bosscat is our favorite place.  We were here recently for my husband's birthday dinner with friends
column2: and it was the perfect choice.  Our server
column4: went above and beyond to make it a memorable experience.   Their signature drink
column6: looks just as good as it tastes.   The floor to ceiling whiskey selection is something to see.   The food
column7: drinks and service all exceeded our expectations.   Can't wait to go back!
